channel.title: Pk-box (pics included)
channel.description:
Well, I have been trying for a while, and i cannot seem to understand how to work the coords for a pk box anybody have any idea what i would put in these coords to make this my pk box?
if ((coordY >= 0) && (coordY <= 0) && (coordX <= 0) && (coordX >= 0), and yes i know its not the full code, it's just an example, :D
and here is were i'd like my pk-box,
[URL=http://img175.imageshack.us/i/ape1.png/][IMG]http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/4892/ape1.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[u]Edit: I know you guys aren't suppose to do everything for me, but im at the point were i can't get it, so if you would, please take the time and get me the coords :D[/u]
